@AmeAmeSakura And in the spirit of being healthy, I will not feed you all 18 cupcakes I made today! Promise! :p Havent even iced the buggers

When it's #fullmoon and #friday13th and you're sitting wondering how long it'll take for your crazy to show. So, in advance, #ItWasntMe
#thelegomovie #lifelessons: It's all about #perspective "I step in mud, I got new brown shoes. It's awesome to win and it's awesome to lose"
@Zin5ki "Bough" I grant you. Not sure beau counts though as we stole it from the French. I just hope the same person didn't pick all 3 words
It's currently bugging my happiness that bow (ribbon) and bow (bending at the waist) are pronounced differently. Who felt the need?
@Zin5ki Dude, it's meant to go in your face.
A friendly face and some good chat is sometimes exactly what you need. Hot chocolate and pizza help. Finishing the night with wine. #winning
@markiplier You finally did it - You cracked Google! https://t.co/sNA159o1eu
@AmeAmeSakura We had homemade trifle but cherry cheesecake sounds nom! :D

@AmeAmeSakura Hmm, maybe not :p Nah, I'm sure you can follow instructions!
@AmeAmeSakura No, no. I trust you. Wrapping it in different paper was enough :p xxx
@AmeAmeSakura Now you have to make me lunch ðŸ˜‚
@AmeAmeSakura @ARX7Laevatein ... ... ... Ahuh. So you do. If it takes you more than 20 secs to eat I'll be disappointed lol
@AmeAmeSakura Only 8 more days til you get to open the other two I gave you! Xxx
@AmeAmeSakura Thank you so much sweetie! I love my presents! And your wrapping was beautiful, as always! Xxx
@AmeAmeSakura The way I've seen you snaffle it, plus you told me, plus I was conferring with @ARX7Laevatein lol. Gotta get it right for xmas
@AmeAmeSakura Why are you telling me lol? I bloody know! I bought a ton of haribo and sat picking the eggs out just for you ðŸ˜‚
@AmeAmeSakura Give me 8 weeks first lol
@AmeAmeSakura Just in case you somehow missed that they were snack pots! :p

@AmeAmeSakura This was one of the first things I bought - brought this back from England for you! :p
@AmeAmeSakura That's fine. My tags are bossing me and I'm bossing you with numbers lol
@AmeAmeSakura Not to worry - I found said instructions and am actually capable of following them lol

Also I love how #WerewolfWednesday was already a thing. I bow to your superior #hashtagskills , Twittersphere.
On a scale from 1-10, how worried should I be that the guy in front of me on the bus smells like wet dog yet has NO DOG? #WerewolfWednesday
Watching Home Alone, crying like a little bitch, but I just put on my eyeliner like "Would you just please not?"
Ppl spending Fri cuddled up with kids/partner or out drinking&I consider today a win because I made two kinds of soup & didn't kill myself.
When you look so pissed off in town that shoppers part around you like the Red Sea, just to avoid coming too close and risking losing a limb
That bizarre moment when you dream you're in a club and the beat's about to drop but you get woken up by your weird jazz-funk alarm instead.
Beer, nachos and Deadpool? You're playing my jam! #nightin #Deadpool
When you're talking to the glow in the dark plastic bats in your cupboard you probably had too much to drink. # bringbackhalloween #drunk

When you look forward to today so much but then you dream about Hong Kong and wake up feeling gutted that you aren't there. Party over here.
@AmeAmeSakura To be honest, nobody wants me to have another bottle right now anyway but I'd murder a pizza!
@Zin5ki I had winter berry flavour but I looked at the label. It was raspberry, blackcurrant and apple. Aren't they summer fruits?

5 bottles of cider brings the fact that your mum is in your phone contacts under "Dude Bro" to whole new levels of hilarious! #funny #drunk
@AmeAmeSakura @TokyoFashion @jk_rowling @HarryPotterFilm Ron, Ron, Ron Weasley! Never wanted to cuddle him more - and that's impressive!
Standing outside the tesco recycling area waiting for my sister to pick me up and I admit that's a bit weird but is there any need to glare?
@AmeAmeSakura Thanks chick! Been looking forward to it for days :D Going to Chopstix after I realised how awesome it was with you :p
@AmeAmeSakura Besides I needed chopping boards for ages so just gave up and bought plastic ones so prob won't buy him even tho I want to now
@AmeAmeSakura While that would normally be the case I am off to Livy with the sister to see Bridget Jones' Baby and go shopping :)
@AmeAmeSakura Oh my glob! That's the cutest bloody thing! :D
Cowboy Bebop still has the best theme tune of anything, ever.
Please feel free to add me in #Pewdiepie #TuberSimulator as Snowflakefaerie #allthesubs
I wish anything in my life was as perfect as Morticia Addams' lipstick! #addamsfamily
Loving @HeartScotland playing the soundtrack to my childhood on the #timetunnel this morning. Epic!
When you buy a winter coat and the next day it's obligingly 9 degrees & you actually get to wear it! #WinterIsComing https://t.co/8aut2tu0wa
That #awkward moment when you want to ask what someone's lovely perfume is but can't because you have to preface it with "you smell nice".
Just watched three children #Gangnamstyle their way over a zebra crossing. Very very pointedly, staring at the drivers. #WTF
@Zin5ki I expect the Americans can just about cope, thanks to the good ol' hotdog. Besides, "toad in the hole" is a far worse offender!

@Zin5ki It is the very specific type of ladybird, the mother-in-law-bird. She comes to your house and judges you. Do you feel the judgement?
@AmeAmeSakura True story! And ate honey chicken with hardly any honey and a fruit salad composed only of strawberries. I fail at hostess.
The #BigBoss look - when you're so tired you can only keep one eye open. Eyepatch, robot arm and head shrapnel accessories sold separately
When someone sits beside you on the bus so you can't change songs on your ipod without them thinking you're trying to grab their ass :/
